Subject: Enhance Your Email Experience, Bronze Award in the CSR Category in KSA, Leading Steppers in Chalhoub 30x30, Swarovski Opening, This #PINKtober, Real Links Referral Emiratisation Winners, Retail Academy Graduation in Qatar & Jobs Opp...

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/kCBt93J8dUmcD4CGrtw_oA/544502/4C7433AD8F37E0FA9D7A0F760761734E/top-banner-eng.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/kCBt93J8dUmcD4CGrtw_oA/550406/58EF5C71A267F8C62DBA45514B173D31/info-sec-01.png> 	

Enhance Your Email Experience with Chalhoub Email Security! 


Last week, we implemented Mimecast, an advanced email security solution, to strengthen protection against email cyber threats such as phishing, ransomware and malware. Mimecast will run seamlessly in the background to filter malicious emails and enhance security, there will be notifications that require your attention and action: 

- New email subject line to alert you of potential spam or suspicious emails. 
- Email links changed to Mimecast URLs so Mimecast can check for malicious content. 
- Mimecast notifications of blocked emails due to suspected malicious content or sender.

chunks.text:
- Mimecast notifications of blocked emails due to suspected malicious content or sender.
- The Permit & Block function in Mimecast allows you to control email security by choosing to permit (release) or block specific senders, ensuring that only trusted emails reach your inbox while filtering out potential threats. 

For detailed information on what to anticipate and how to manage these changes, find out more here. <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fchalhoubgroup-servicedesk.freshservice.com%252fsupport%252fsolutions%252farticles%252f52000111575%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWRHfWjP1MVwR71B5MQ9eypr1IfjJ7IPP0Rw8h9Z1QhhkvD13u3ZrOZLvEkpRNXmLt0utrT7OhUJ4yijTfcRTrtKs3d94MHri7RkHvuE4rVjW7w7ag3iBF59nHMCPMPoHkbIJ7S5ePLKN9cKf%252f9Flqpflu0ivv92fIW4L8BijahMZCwYGCl9euUL1UPtjD8TdGe1ZObjobZjJzcCDOZt4etjWFiQFrTaN4%252bZ2rXHDNGAb&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Cd197a988410549b7362108dcfe5eb074%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638664929857761248%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=HFQkUzzcip8ZwKjclizwyOoeiA6GQrv1GSk%2B65wchSM%3D&reserved=0>

RECEIVING THE BRONZE AWARD FOR THE CSR CATEGORY IN KSA

Our Group received the bronze award in the Corporate Social Responsibility category from the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development, recognising our integration of ESG best practices in KSA.

chunks.text:
Group received the bronze award in the Corporate Social Responsibility category from the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development, recognising our integration of ESG best practices in KSA. This recognition reflects our ongoing commitment to sustainable practices and fostering a culture of responsibility. 

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/kCBt93J8dUmcD4CGrtw_oA/550587/1F6C04413B566B85F3A8BC9B914407C4/photo.jpeg> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/kCBt93J8dUmcD4CGrtw_oA/545072/F9670E75BFBEAD7654103D661CBD8759/nuggets-38.png> 	

LEADING STEPPERS IN CHALHOUB 30X30

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/kCBt93J8dUmcD4CGrtw_oA/550586/4075DEE33D0D994229AEB1FE8335B3F9/image-2024-11-06t122721-388.jpeg> 	
We're halfway through Chalhoub 30x30, and already we're seeing some incredible dedication! Shoutout to our top 5 steppers who are in the lead so far. 

If you haven't joined yet, there is still time to join us as we make our mark as the most active Group! Join here. <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252feur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com%252f%253furl%253dhttps%25253A%25252F%25252Fwww.onechalhoub.com%25252FNews%25252F59333%25252Fchalhoub-30x30-is-back%2526data%253d05%25257C02%25257CAmal.Bedhyefi%252540chalhoub.com%25257C40fde83a69364f7fde6b08dcfcbbf984%25257C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%25257C0%25257C0%25257C638663131538402756%25257CUnknown%25257CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%25253D%25257C0%25257C%25257C%25257C%2526sdata%253dJObPG0DBO1%25252FEFIxHmx8QYAm3vGL0Y4WuLmV7qykmmng%25253D%2526reserved%253d0%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWRHfWjP1MVwR71B5MQ9eypr1IfjJ7IPP0Rw8h9Z1QhhkvD13u3ZrOZLvEkpRNXmLt0utrT7OhUJ4yijTfcRTrtKs3d94MHri7RkHvuE4rVjW7w7ag3iBF59nHMCPMPoHkbIJ7S5ePLKN9cKf%252f9Flqpflu0ivv92fIW4L8BijahMZCwYGCl9euUL1UPtjD8TdGe1ZObjobZjJzcCDOZt4etjWFiQFrTaN4%252bZ2rXHDNGAb&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Cd197a988410549b7362108dcfe5eb074%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638664929857790543%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=FzqYF99KLMk5QRwpjqHijmtt%2Fhw4uVsyguNYP1aCd3E%3D&reserved=0>

SWAROVSKI GALLERIA AL MARYAH ISLAND WELCOMES YOU AGAIN

Get ready for a stunning transformation with our brand-new store concept, reflecting the elegance and innovation of Swarovski.

Visit the newly renovated store in Galleria Al Maryah Island, Abu Dhabi.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/kCBt93J8dUmcD4CGrtw_oA/550590/695BF596748BBFF2D3A0D51B948353BF/store-blue-concept-jpeg.jpeg> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/kCBt93J8dUmcD4CGrtw_oA/549433/3313A052F911679EB07CAA448C355A00/untitled-design-55.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/kCBt93J8dUmcD4CGrtw_oA/550525/3AF3B0965BF3029B5782FDA1214A75F7/banner-43.png> 	

Call for Nominations: Collaboration and Co-Creation


Spotlight your colleagues who transform teamwork into tangible results. Nominate for the Chalhoub Excellence Awards – Collaboration and Co-Creation, recognising our team members who break silos, build trust, and drive sustainable success for us all. 

Nominations will be open to all team members until November 22nd.

NOMINATE NOW

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/kCBt93J8dUmcD4CGrtw_oA/549433/3313A052F911679EB07CAA448C355A00/untitled-design-55.png>

CREATING IMPACT TOGETHER THIS #PINKTOBER

In October, we hosted a special event at Al Jalila Foundation, providing makeup and makeovers for 100 cancer survivors. Thank you to our Beauty and Faces teams for their incredible support. You can also support the #PINKtober initiative by purchasing daffodil pins from Faces, Lacoste, Tryano & Level Shoes. All proceeds will be donated to Al Jalila Foundation.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/kCBt93J8dUmcD4CGrtw_oA/550591/BACD20CCD83D453104E1B9BA48A427FB/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-38.gif>

REAL LINKS REFERRAL EMIRATISATION CAMPAIGN WINNERS

Congratulations to our three winners of the Real Links Referral Emiratisation Campaign: Sujay Dsilva, Nick Vinckier, Yasmin Izzard! 

Remember, you can always refer great talent and earn rewards in the process! 

Check out the details here <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fwww.onechalhoub.com%252fsites%252fpeople-culture%252fSitePageModern%252f54983%252fi-m-referring%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWRHfWjP1MVwR71B5MQ9eypr1IfjJ7IPP0Rw8h9Z1QhhkvD13u3ZrOZLvEkpRNXmLt0utrT7OhUJ4yijTfcRTrtKs3d94MHri7RkHvuE4rVjW7w7ag3iBF59nHMCPMPoHkbIJ7S5ePLKN9cKf%252f9Flqpflu0ivv92fIW4L8BijahMZCwYGCl9euUL1UPtjD8TdGe1ZObjobZjJzcCDOZt4etjWFiQFrTaN4%252bZ2rXHDNGAb&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Cd197a988410549b7362108dcfe5eb074%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638664929857831775%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=KI%2FWrAZAkY%2BaEHQLBwxyhiFGOsdoRaWHFD53qQGdGE8%3D&reserved=0>

RETAIL ACADEMY GRADUATION CEREMONY IN QATAR

Last week, we hosted a graduation ceremony to recognise the hard work and dedication of our Store Consultants. With 62 Consultants successfully completing the CRVQ programme, 4 Store Leaders excelling in the L1 CAP programme and 3 Retail Managers completing the L2 CAP programme. Congrats to all our graduates!

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/kCBt93J8dUmcD4CGrtw_oA/550588/4B6E8A70C50213179677669858ABE8AF/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-37.gif>
